Class curam.util.resources.Locale

Added Methods
String getFormattedDate(DateTime, String, Locale) Format a DateTime using the format and locale passed in to determine the format and locale of the date to return.
String getFormattedDate(DateTime, Locale) Format a DateTime using the default date format and using the locale passed in to determine the locale to format the string in.
String getFormattedDateTime(DateTime, String, Locale) Format a DateTime using the specified date format.
String getFormattedDateTime(DateTime, Locale) Format a DateTime using the default date/time format and the locale passed in.
String getFormattedTime(DateTime, String, Locale) Format a DateTime using the specified date format.
void resetLocaleCache() This method is for testing purposes ONLY and must NEVER be called outside a Unit Test environment.
